スエズ運河より地中海方面へ\n進出！周辺海域を制圧しつつ\nマルタ島への増援輸送:
Advance from the Suez
Canal to the
Mediterranean! Conduct
a reinforcement transport
operation to Malta while
controlling the surrounding
waters! Fleet, sortie!
これよりスエズ運河から、地中海に！:
We're now going entering the
Mediterranean Sea from the Suez Canal!
付近に敵増援部隊を認む。警戒を厳に！:
We have enemy reinforcements
in the vicinity. Remain vigilant!
艦隊は、紅海よりスエズ運河に！:
The Fleet is going from the
Red Sea to the Suez Canal!
Force H、出撃する! 敵港湾拠点を叩き、敵地中海\n艦隊主力第1及び第2艦:
Force H, sortie! Strike the enemy harbor point, and
search and destroy the enemy's 1st and 2nd
     Mediterranean Fleets!
対空、対水上警戒を厳とせよ！\n合戦用意！ 全艦隊、戦闘態勢をとれ！:
Anti-aircraft and anti-surface alert! Prepare
for battle! All ships, take battle stations!
敵影見ず…されど敵艦隊らしき通信を傍受せり。\n警戒を厳に。周辺海域捜索の要を認:
No sign of the enemy, but we have intercepted a
transmission that appears to be from them.
Remain vigilant. We must search the surroundings!
最前線マルタ島です。周辺警戒を厳に！:
This is Malta, the front line.
Stay alert!
